name: douban-library-extension
description: 豆瓣北京图书馆馆藏查询助手 - A browser extension that helps you check Beijing Library collection status on Douban book pages

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy
scripts.copy: node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('dist', {recursive: true})" && node -e "['manifest.json','content.js','background.js','styles.css','rules.json'].forEach(f => require('fs').copyFileSync(f, 'dist/' + f))" && node -e "require('fs').cpSync('icons', 'dist/icons', {recursive: true})"
scripts.pack: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../douban-library-extension.zip *
scripts.test: echo 'Manual testing required - Load extension in Edge developer mode'
